title: Are there any special arrangements for the last two beach homes at the north end of Canal Drive in Carolina Beach? Unless the setup has changed recently the two houses appear to be beyond the checkpoint or entry way to Freeman Park. Do they need a pass to get to their house? What about family and friends visiting? It seems like it would be a nightmare just trying to get to your own home when the Freeman Park entrance backs up.
